example_sentence_english: I'd like a sparkling water, please.

notes: plural used for bodies/types of water; countable plural

example_sentence_italian: Le acque del fiume sono inquinate.
Ho assaggiato delle acque minerali diverse.
example_sentence_english: I tasted some different mineral waters.
The taste of the water is strange.
Add the pasta to the boiling water.
He came out of the water trembling.
From the waters emerged a boat.
I found a bottle in the water.

example_sentence_italian: Nelle acque tropicali vivono molte specie.
example_sentence_english: Many species live in the tropical waters.
The boat floats on the water.

example_sentence_italian: La nebbia si posa sulle acque del porto.
example_sentence_english: The fog settles on the waters of the harbor.

notes: no single-word contraction with feminine l' (use 'con l'')
example_sentence_english: Mix the mixture with the water.

example_sentence_italian: La barca naviga con le acque calme.
example_sentence_english: The boat sails with the calm waters.

notes: incorrect: 'col' = con + il (masculine); not used with feminine l' — use 'con l'acqua' instead
example_sentence_italian: Col acqua fredda non è consigliabile preparare questa miscela (forma scorretta).
example_sentence_english: With cold water it is not advisable to prepare this mixture (incorrect form).

notes: incorrect: 'coi' = con + i (masculine plural); not used with feminine le — use 'con le acque' instead
example_sentence_italian: Coi acque limpide si possono vedere i pesci (forma scorretta).
example_sentence_english: With clear waters you can see the fish (incorrect form).
